website_summaries.verdict: An elegant addition to any house. Functional and durable with an optional matching accessories set available.
pros: Notable for its easy open base slider, which takes the hassle out of inserting tissue boxes
Fits most standard square box sizes
Very well-made, with heavy-duty construction that looks and feels solid
cons: Some buyers find it too large

customer_reviews.title: If at first you don't succeed...
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time wanting this and not getting it because, IT'S EXPENSIVE! I was disappointed when it arrived, very large, chipped on the edges and not terribly attractive like the pics. Then the rest of the set arrived and it did not match the other items. I went through amazon and did a return for replacement, which arrived the same day. The replacement matches the other items and is smaller, heavier and of much better quality. So the moral of my story is, if it doesn't look like the picture, try again. Maybe you'll get lucky like I did.
customer_reviews.author: wb4471

customer_reviews.title: Conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Who knew a tissue box would be a conversation piece? Very heavy, solid, well made, even has sliding cover for bottom. Looks so much better in a guest bath than the unpredictable mystery pattern boxes Kleenex ships you.
customer_reviews.author: Terretta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful love it. You do have to measure the square tissue boxes, they are not all the same height. The one I had was just a bit higher couldn’t get the sliding door closed on the bottom. Went to Walmart found their brand box is shorter. Fits perfectly. This is a gorgeous quality tissue box holder. So lovely in my powder room. I love the mother of pearl....pretty pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality
customer_reviews.text: This mother of pearl tissue cover is beautiful. It fits a pop up tissue box perfectly and is weighty enough to stay put when pulling tissues from the box. I am very particular, and I cannot find one flaw anywhere on the one I received. We have received several compliments on it, and I plan to gift this item in the future. It was packed well and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cramer

customer_reviews.title: The mother-of-pearl shimmers beautifully, and I love how the sliding bottom holds ...
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy, well-made, and gorgeous in person. The mother-of-pearl shimmers beautifully, and I love how the sliding bottom holds the tissue box in place. It's a nice touch that I didn't realize I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL and HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful. I purchased one for my home office and one for my daughters bedroom. They are heavy and have a bottom slide door to secure the Kleenex box inside of the box. Will be purchasing a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: beauty in a box
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tissue box cover. It looks great in my bedroom and adds some bling. I bought it in 2017 and the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: goodz42

customer_reviews.title: Careful when you pick it up!
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty, and was quite a bit heavier than I expected. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because you have to be very careful when you pick it up or the bottom slides off easily. It kept falling out so I had to hold on to it when I set it down to keep it from sliding. It would be helpful if it kind of clicked or locked into place or had a latch.
customer_reviews.author: leigh98204

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Tissue Holder
customer_reviews.text: The tissue holder is just beautiful. Every time I walk into my bathroom it puts a big smile on my face. However, I'm not a big fan of the bottom lid due to its pale, uninspiring color. Thankfully, it's easy to hide against the back of the vanity.
customer_reviews.author: sfcjohnnyj

customer_reviews.title: They are larger but nice
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty but very heavy and on the larger size. If you can easily fit them, do order. But for me, the one was too large for my one bathroom and I couldn’t use it. Luckily I had a place to put it. The bottom slides open so your tissues don’t fall out. It’s a handy part of the holder. Yes, I’d buy them again but make sure I had room for them. They are larger.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty for an area with gold tones
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new home when I realized my stainless tissue boxes did not look great in my dressing areas which has more gold tones. It is heavy so outside of dropping it, I think it will last years and years. And, it appears exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn In Houston, TXTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A little pricy but looks great
customer_reviews.text: No obvious flaws in workmanship. Item is a little pricy but you get what you pay for. Nice heft to this and it's the first time I've seen a tissue box holder with a sliding door on the bottom, so this seems a little more high end. Overall color/shading makes for a versatile dispenser that will complement a variety of neutral, warm, or cool colors.
customer_reviews.author: B&K Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with other capiz shell items I bought for the bathroom. Just love it - tissue boxes fit real good inside. The colors are nice - browns, ivory and white - really pretty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G. Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and substantial. It has a removable bottom, so I can fit a full box of tissues into the container without the cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Brumley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and looks so expensive. Works great dispensing tissues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Matches my mother of pearl mosaic tile sink perfectly. Very well made and fits a standard cube tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Crack and chip
customer_reviews.text: Really like the design and the color, but the first one came with a crack on the top surface, the replacement has a chip at the corner. Too bad have to return both
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Kleenex Box
customer_reviews.text: The item is well made. The colors in it make it very attractive. It is very heavy which makes it kitty proof. The cats love to explore new things, this box is heavy & won't be knocked off the vanity!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah DeWilde

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice tissue covers, the box is substantial in weight and very pretty. The only thing I am not 100% on is the color of the base as another review noted, the slide out part is an yellow ivory shade that doesn't quite match. I am going to paint it.
customer_reviews.author: Msc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this tissue holder. It blends well with any color. Pretty and functional and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Mother of Pearl blended fully with my ensuite.
customer_reviews.text: Rich looking mother of pearl. Sturdy and well weighted. Will not slip or move when using.
customer_reviews.author: Maiven

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box is huge. Too much empty space when you place a cube size tissue box inside. Not well made as uneven edges on every side and surprisingly heavy. For the price, which was expensive I was expecting much better quality and a properly sized box. Unfortunately this is not functional and unusable. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TravelBug

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty tissue holder
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty tissue holder. Adds a touch of elegance to my bathroom counter top. LOVE the bottom closure! This feature makes moving it easier to clean under.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely! It’s expensive for a tissue holder but I purchased to match my bathroom that I’m re-doing. It’s very pretty. Glad I purchased it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for each guest bathroom. These are beautiful, and very sturdy. They weighed a lot more than I thought they would. Nice accent!

customer_reviews.title: Great kleenex box
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this item. Was even better than I thought it would be. It Is large and solid. Would highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I usually think there’s room for some improvement in a lot of things but definitely not this. It is beautiful and I would buy it again if I needed too. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Item has chip in it
customer_reviews.text: Tissue box holder came with a chip on the side corner of the tissue box. Really wish this was looked over before being sent out to me.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great quality. Very happy with this purchase. Goes great in every room I placed it in too.

customer_reviews.title: Great tissue box
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tissue box holder. Looks great in our bedroom. Subtle colors go with our beach theme.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would be a lightweight, typical Kleenex box. I received a STURDY, WELL-MADE, BEAUTIFUL box. Loved it so much, I ordered another. It is gorgeous!

customer_reviews.title: It has a bottom to keep the tissue box from falling out if you need to lift it . I love that !!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many covers , and for the same price I got more than expected . It is BEAUTIFULLY made ,I especially like the bottom because it holds the tissue box secure !!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box is so pretty!! We will probably get a mirror to match. Also, it is a sturdy and heavy tissue box which is nice, and the bottom slides out to insert the box. Also it doesn't have any sharp corners so it doesn't scratch our marble top vanity. Very nice and highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have this box on my desk and get lots of compliments on how beautiful it is. It definitely adds personality and a sense of elegance to the room. Once I leave my office for the day and turn off the light, I am pleased with how nice it looks, which is better than looking at a cardboard box of tissue.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but look for the dimensions, it's big.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tissue for my bathroom but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have many tissue boxes around my house, 1/2 dozen wood ones, a black metal one, several rattan boxes, a chrome one, even a mother of pearl one depending on the room decor they are used in. In my opinion nothing detracts from a room's decor like an ugly tissue box which quickly draws the eye. Kleenex, Puffs, and store brands must have contests to see who can design the most unattractive tissue boxes, they are all awful. This box looks nice and is overpriced but I could not replace it for less. I matches the decor in the room where it is used and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff2468

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & Substantial
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I wouldn't pay this much for a tissue holder, but I had a $10 gift card, so that made it a bit less expensive. Also, I thought this was so pretty, and knew it would look great in the bedroom. I wasn't disappointed. This holder is a good, solid weight, and looks as pretty in person as it does in the picture. I'm very happy with it, and plan to use it for many years to come. I highly recommend this, as you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ComfyShoeMaven

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant

customer_reviews.title: Lovely

product_meta.title: Creative Scents Tissue Box Cover – Decorative Square Tissue Holder is Finished in Beautiful Mother of Pearl Milano Collection
feature_bullets: DECORATIVE TISSUE BOX HOLDER – Cover Fits Most Standard Square Kleenex & Other Tissue Boxes; Features Sleek Natural Capiz Shell With Elegant Checkered Design
EASY-OPEN BASE SLIDER – Durably Crafted Base Slides In & Out For Easy Loading of New Box; Pretty Holder Discreetly Covers Entire Box for Ultimate Convenience
LARGE TOP OPENING – Sizeable Oval Opening Makes Grabbing Tissue Hassle-Free; Versatile Dispenser Accommodates Number of Unique Box Sizes & Designs
MATCHING BATHROOM SET – Tissue Paper Holder Complements Our Complete Line of Bath Accessories; Pair w/Matching Wastebasket, Toothbrush Holder, Etc.
DÉCOR FOR YOUR MODERN HOME – Stunning Iridescent White & Beige Holder Also Makes Lovely Addition in the Kitchen, Living Room, Office or Beach House

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars266 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
